data.title: Maine Medical Center
data.meta_description: MaineHealth Maine Medical Center is a complete health care resource for the people of northern New England.
data.text:
We empower our employees by promoting personal responsibility, and encouraging creative thinking and innovation.

Maine’s only full-service children’s hospital offering everything from well-child visits to specialized medical and surgical treatments

From volunteering your time to making a gift, there are many ways you can help make a positive impact on the communities we serve.

MaineHealth Maine Medical Center is committed to helping you improve your health and well-being.

A complete health care resource for northern New England

Read the latest MaineHealth Maine Medical Center news.

Contact us by phone or mail.

Information for health care providers.

Connected to Better

We are proud to be part of MaineHealth, a not-for-profit, integrated health system committed to providing high-quality affordable care, educating tomorrow's caregivers and researching better ways to provide care. MaineHealth includes a Level 1 trauma medical center, eight additional licensed hospitals, comprehensive pediatric care services, an extensive behavioral health care network, diagnostic services as well as home health, hospice and senior care services. With more than 2,000 employed providers and approximately 23,000 care team members, MaineHealth provides preventive care, diagnosis and treatment to 1.1 million residents in Maine and New Hampshire.

Modernization Project

MaineHealth Maine Medical Center Portland recently completed the largest campus modernization and replacement project in its history. This patient-focused initiative enables the state’s largest hospital to meet the most urgent health care needs well into the future.

Contact Us

View contact information for MaineHealth Maine Medical Center Portland and MaineHealth Maine Medical Center Biddeford/Sanford.

Latest News

View All

Actor Patrick Dempsey Visits MaineHealth Barbara Bush Children’s Hospital

The Lewiston native is participating in the Drive Fore Kids celebrity golf tournament, benefitting the MaineHealth Barbara Bush Children’s Hospital and the Dempsey Center.

MaineHealth Launches Mobile Health Unit in Portland

The MaineHealth Preble Street Learning Collaborative (MHPSLC) is launching a mobile health unit to provide low-barrier, on-demand treatment for unhoused patients with psychiatric and substance use disorders in greater Portland.

Maine Medical Center, Southern Maine Health Care Complete License, Medical Staff Integration

Coming together as one multi-campus medical center allows the two MaineHealth hospitals to better leverage resources, share clinical expertise and add new slots for physician training.

Maine Medical Center Scheduled to Open Malone Family Tower on June 9

The eight-story cardiac and cardiovascular care tower expands Maine Medical Center’s capacity to provide specialized, high-quality care.
